summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3629, for the improvement of the alley between block 53, Supplemental Pontius 2nd Addition and block 2, Harvard Heights Addition, being the alley between Belmont Avenue North and Boylston Avenue North, from East John Street to East Thomas Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 44840, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
